name: Heng Li 0007
content: Me in a Nutshell - Heng Li Sunrise on Lake Ontario, Kingston Heng Li PhD, Eng., Associate Professor Follow Canada Twitter GitHub Email I am a professor in the Department of Computer Engineering and Software Engineering at Polytechnique Montréal (University of Montreal), Montréal, Canada where I lead the MOOSE lab. My students and I perform research to ensure the performance and reliability of modern software systems, primarily through performance engineering, runtime monitoring, and analytics.
